review: i got around 30 minutes in was not fun nor was it mentally challenging just felt like i was doing random things hoping it would work the art for the characters and objects are high quality but the backgrounds just look unfinished i dont recommend
this was a brilliant point and click adventure loved it

an intriguing adventure game where the player takes the role of a special agent with enhanced abilities in a world attempting to rebuild itself after an apocalyptic event caused by ai  there is definitely potential for sequels here as one wants to find out more about this world but for now it remains a hidden gem for pointandclick adventure gamers

i can recommend this game   this classic pointandclick adventure game has an interesting storyline set against a scifi backdrop but its the innovative traits system that really makes it stand out this cool feature adapts the riddles based on the traits you develop making sure you get a unique playthrough every time and making the game more replayable
good and short game with an intricate story and interesting puzzles
interesting game and very good soundtrack
meow

great game i like the atmosphere the scfi posttechnobutnotreally themed world and the overall narative the augs makes the gameplay interesting and the investigation is  engaging puzzles arent hard but keeps you going beautiful pixel artwork too music fit very well voice acting too everything fits great together  i enjoyed this game a lot

artwork and voice acting are excellent i also like the nordic setting the game doesnt outstay its welcome which is both negative and positive on the downside there were a few puzzles where i absolutely had no clue on what to do next all in all it was definitely worth playing once but i cant see myself playing it again to experience the other story branches
fun interesting combo of powers mixed with point and click i liked it thank you
the game is extremely abstract in some of the puzzles like it literally makes no sense other than to be hard for the sake of being hard and confusing storyline was fine but not amazing by any stretch
couldve done without all the f words but it was a very enjoyable experience with a cool story cool mechanics and good voice acting im gonna do the whole thing again to get the other ending now d
a hearty thumbs up from me

this game is gas i am honestly only writing this review so that more games like it come up in my recommended games list
nice story nice game flow overall a pretty good experience

man it was a great story and told in a brilliant way i liked how in many cases you didnt have just one solution to a puzzle and how your choices directly affected how you could solve puzzles later on voice acting was also really good

i loved it

still at the very beginning of the game and i already love where the story is heading
very good small and fun game

great adventure game good writing my one issue is the norse gods aspect that seems both to be central to the society while also completely ignored i feel like there was an intention to do more with it but it was axed and now it just doesnt serve much of a purpose maybe it can be delved into more in a sequel
great point and click adventure but i wish they had delved deeper into ai and the post ai world they live in pleasantly surprised with the voice acting in this game the pixel art is beautiful
a very excelente adventure game the story is intriguing and the puzzles are amazing cant recommend it enought
very nice and interesting a bit short but still good

this game is my favourite adventure i liked the story a lot and the main character liked the voice actors i usually get bored quickly and skip dialogs but here the game made me feel curious and care about the characters throughout the whole game the gameplay was my favourite part all the extra skills made exploration and pointing and clicking really fun i felt like the game encouraged me to  think and pay attention it was very rewarding
excellent game
great story and game different paths and multiple endings  ps door puzzle really sucks

i recommend this game to fans of point  click adventures it has a good and interesting plot the music is very well created for each of the scenarios and i find very ingenious the different ways of solving similar situations depending on the different paths that are offered

i really enjoyed this game mechanics differs a lot than the other point and click adventure games that ive played before whispers of a machine has this quiet moody atmosphere that pulled me in right away and the choices you make as protagonist actually feel meaningful i just really liked how the world looked the art style fits perfectly with the tone of the game its a cool nordic scifi mystery game with some emotional weight
love the cyberpunk setting great story that had me hooked in no time well worth your time for any point  click adventure game fan
great story and oh boy that atmosphere highly recommended
this game has probably one of the smoothest set of controls ever i really enjoyed it and the music is beautiful too
this game is symbolism laden and excellent for a source of high brow meta analysis

this was a fun point and click adventure as of this writing im about to play through a second time to try some of the options i didnt try before the game gave me some of the vibes of beneath a steel sky though it was its own compelling story if you like 90s point and click adventure games i recommend this it has enough of the 90s features with its own mechanisms to add something new

pretty cool post apocalyptic cyberpunk pointnclick adventure  it makes interesting use of its engine and setting to give additional options beyond just click on this thing  i found the puzzles very logical and straightforward but ive been playing these games since before steam sierra lucasarts  a very small number of puzzles require timing  it is a bit on the short side but goes for quality over quantity id say
excellent game
excellent game

great story and gameplay i loved the multiple route options and the investigation mechanics really immersive detective feel for an adventure game the puzzles were really good as well i only got stumped a couple times but the puzzles are challenging without being too obtuse and if you pay attention the clues are there interesting scifi tale definitely check it out if youre a point and click fan
another high quality adventure game studio point and clicker  deals with some powerful themes and multiple ways to play depending on your choices highly recommended
interesting story many paths to the goal more than one ending the level of puzzle difficulty is just right  i recommend it i might play again
definitely in the top echelon of relatively point and click adventure games
whoa storyline was a gut punch even if i occasionally got stuck on where to go next
1010 interesting and twisty plot i was surprised with how the story went and the gameplaypuzzle solving is creative

a neat point and click game with some added cyberpunk features and a smattering of branching pathsalternative solutions not as good as beneath a steel sky but worth a play if you like adventure games for sure

intelligently written full of atmosphere philosophical and engaging and you can play it with different personality styles too gem of a game that should keep you occupied between 5 to 10 hours close to 7 in my case  absolutely loved it
fun short game
at 3 this game was an absolute steal a fun game with great voice acting puzzles that actually make sense and a really engaging story line

this is such a good old school point and click game the story and mystery are both really good followed by and excellent voice acting my only criticism is in regards to art work which is uneven  some backgrounds are simply lacking other than that i appreciate ideas creators had augmentations are a really cool mechanic in such game  overall a huge recommend

im pretty new to point  click games but whispers of a machine is so far my favorite of the genre the story sucked me in the puzzles were the perfect level of challenging and some of the new mechanics they introduced worked really well im super glad i gave the genre a go and im ecstatic to see that there are still devs breathing new life into an old genre playing this game just feels cozy

big recommend its a nice and simple point and click adventure game it does not stump you that often and its not difficult to know what can be clicked i can not recommend this game enough  the characters and story are good too

really enjoyed only had to use the walkthrough a few times i was worried because i read that it was buggy on mac but had no such problems downloaded this game after kathy rain by the same guys but think i liked this one better because of the additional toolsnuances for a point  click enjoyer this game was great
love this

it was a pretty decent one took me 8 hours to complete and about 20 crashes along the way the game is super buggy on macos regardless i recommend it for a small price the puzzles mostly made sense some were more challenging than other but there is no use every object on every other object and maybe it will work type of vibe maybe once just break the photo hehe
this is a fantastic game especially if you are a fan of the genre love the music too 1010
i really liked this game in adventure games like this setting story and atmosphere is as important as gameplace i like the replayability different solutions to puzzles and great storyline
well made

whispers of a machine is an excellent pointandclick adventure a solid story good writing and really superb voiceovers kept my interest from beginning to end the music is minimalist but creates a more immersive atmosphere the art is not the best ive seen in an adventure game of this type but everything is handdrawn evocative recognizable and pretty enough the ui is modern helpful and very usable perhaps not a masterpiece but a clear recommendation

a little bit buggy gives error and shuts down especially when you double click to exit or enter a place but its kind of ok as it autosaves frequently still a good old school game with cool atmosphere and background musics
i really love this game despite being stuck for a very long time lol feels like asimov in ways and the voice acting is a delight ill update if i ever progress
engaging and entertaining

interesting pointandclick puzzler game time 10 hours not including replay to cover achievements game and story are linear though you have choices in how you approach some puzzles some of the puzzlessolutions are very obscure but for the most part it does a good job of giving you enough hint to figure out the path forward

this is generally considered one of the best pointandclick adventures of the past decade   i enjoyed it although i found some of the puzzles nonintuitive and frustrating and had to consult a walkthrough at times which is fine   the lack of a manual save feature is also annoying   but the strengths of the game are undeniable  great worldbuilding and storytelling   i would give this an 85 out of 10

the setting  a postfall zero cpu primitive scifi future  and the excellent puzzles really help this game to shine it is shorter snappier and a much smoother experience than the previous instalment from this developer can definitely recommend if you want a good detective game some pointing and clicking or a nice scifi narrative
enjoyable game i appreciate the replayability of it good puzzles good storytelling
good to play at work beat it in a day and a half but the replay value is there
very good

picked this game up expecting a good time and got exactly what i expected and more the gameplay is as advertised and fun but you also get an great story and mystery they succeed in giving you a few choices but ones that actually effect your playthrough meaning you get a sense that the game respects your decisions fun puzzles littered throughout loved it and hope to see more in the future
great game

very fun game with a compelling story some parts were a bit hard to figure out the puzzle for but id say there was only really one spot where i could not have figured it out on my own overall a good experience
a great game with good voice acting and a classic adventure game feel well done
great visuals music voice acting and story  im a sucker for scifi and wellcrafted moral choices  definitely a buy
some of the puzzles were a little awkward but i really enjoyed the story and atmosphere
stinky

a short and simple point n click detective adventure dealing with the themes of ai and singularity i like the nordic cyberpunk noir atmosphere the game is fairly linear in the sense that you have to do things in a particular order for the game to progress there is some decision making involved there are quite a few hidden achievements and missing those wont prevent you from finishing the game
pleasant point and click adventure with a multitude of choices to experience various outcomes
there are some bad puzzles but there is a great deal to like with this game
nice pointandclick adventure with some interesting topics and philosophical views you are to solve some murders and get superpowers to help depending on your personality
really good scifi story part of me wish it was longer as the investigationcharacter abilities were terrific and i wanted to play with them more
i really like some of the ideas that was presented and the multiple endings were interesting not the best game but it was fun feels like it needed more work

great game great story  really enjoyed this the story is nice and well put together  the voice acting is up there with the best really very good voice acting  the puzzles are pretty well done and believable   fully recommended

fun point and click adventure with added elements that make puzzlesolving more fun your character has special abilities called augmentations that you have determine when to use to solve puzzles  a crime mystery point and click adventure im thoroughly enjoying it

low noise scifi setting and a murder mystery that is subtle but lacks impact pros  easy to pickup and play  great voice acting thoughtful story  not too drawn out quick pace of story cons  lack of hints when stuck  lack of non intractable npcs makes the world not feel lived in  no option to make the pixel font more legible
not gonna lie that i needed a bit of guidance with this game to get a bit further with the story not everything is really clear on how to investigate it solid story tho
almost 47 hours in this game i played it a couple years ago its fantastic if you like pnc types drama mystery hard choices have fun

a sold mystery adventure with some fun world building its fairly short but ultimately the right length for its story its nothing revolutionary but if you like cyberpunk stories or generally enjoy puzzle adventures its a good play
a classic tale of conflict between religion and technology with a norse legend twist its a short game but has replayability thanks to multiple endings and branching puzzles recommended
really nice point and click adventure game
not a bad little point and click to be fair puzzles are all pretty logical and the story was pretty decent
